_xResult.title: GYPSY Linen Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made maxi skirt with elastic waist
_xResult.longdesc:
If you're going to sport a maxi skirt, why not make it a three-tiered, bohemian style, custom made skirt? This made to measure maxi is wide, comfy and super feminine. We love the deep red color taboot. You can request a custom length, so if you're wanting it shorter, make sure to specify at checkout. 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric is already washed and softened and will shrink no more.
